name: Zombie War - Dead Killer
description:
Zombie War - Dead Killer is the new zombie expert city attack mission and most realistic dead zombie gun target shooter game. Feel the zombie city war shooter objective 3D game in smartphone. trigger zombie mountain hunting game you will experience on expert crazy zombie real hunting.
